skillTree.localised_description: This Tyrant is the size of several large creatures rolled into one. In fact, he ate those several large creatures just yesterday.
The best part of such rampant slaughter is the gory feast that follows.
"Fetch me more bones! This meal could use a little crunch!"

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +8%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: The reeking odour seeping from this one's every pore would offend any creature with a nose, and several without.
It never hurts to keep your lucky Gnoblar with you, just in case.
Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.
Puny magicks are nothing in the face of the Great Maw's endless hunger.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The mighty club in Drulg's hands can shatter even the hardiest of bones, cracking them open so he can sup on the marrow within.
The crushing impact of Drulg on a charge sends even the heftiest of foes flying to their backs, served up like bloody meat in a feasting hall.

ui_effects.localised_text: Increases this unit's ability to knock enemies back while active

stat_effects.description: x0.025 Dealt Collision Knocked Back Threshold
x0.022 Dealt Collision Knocked Down Threshold
x0.02 Dealt Collision Knocked Flying Threshold

skillTree.localised_description: According to rumour, the iron gutplate resting atop of Drulg's extremely extended belly protect not one but two guts, each with its own distinct needs. One gut, it is said, has an unquenchable third for bloodshed. The other has a hunger so bottomless that Drulg is regarded with fear by other Ogre Tyrants during the annual feasts.
Drulg killed his sire by eating his way through the older Ogre's guts. Nothing and no one will stop him from eating when he is hungry.
Meat battered into a bloody pulp on the battlefield and eaten raw delights Drulg like no other.
No one can resist the gut-based shouts of Drulg. Even the mightiest foes quiver at the reverberation of his voice.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Increases this unit's ability to knock enemies back while active

stat_effects.description: x0.025 Dealt Collision Knocked Back Threshold
x0.022 Dealt Collision Knocked Down Threshold
x0.02 Dealt Collision Knocked Flying Threshold

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Drulg won his moniker "Kineater" in the guts out challenge that resulted in his ascension to tribal leader, with Drulg gnawing his way through the gut of his sire.

effects.description:
Meat gained from battles: +10%
	(all units in army)
